title: Must Read: Saks Finalizes Neiman Marcus Acquisition, Nordstrom Family Takes Retailer Private in $6.25 Billion Deal
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion. Saks Global (which controls Saks Fifth Avenue and Saks Off Fifth) finalized its $2.7 billion acquisition of Neiman Marcus Group. "We have created an unparalleled multi-brand luxury portfolio with tremendous growth potential," Saks Executive ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
